products.title: Sevilla Blue Grey  Vertical Blind
products.description: We cannot get enough of grey and just when we thought we'd seen every shade under the sun, out comes another one. The sevilla blue grey vertical blind mixing two serene hues, creating a modern look that'll bring tranquility and calm to your home in an instant.

products.title: Sevilla Royal Blue Vertical Blind
